name: datadog-post-metric-data
description: The metrics end-point allows you to post time-series data that can be graphed on Datadog's dashboards. [See docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/metrics)

points.description: Points relating to a metric. The `key` should be the an Unix timestamp in seconds and `value` should be the point value. Example: `{ "1640995200": 1.0 , "1640998800": 1.1, "1641002400": 1.2 }`. This field will be converted to the expected value for Datadog API
